Posts.Content: HI, Check out the website breastcancer.org there is so much info there for you...Good Luck! Report
Posts.Title: Breast Reconstruction after Mastectomy-Suggestions

Posts.Content: I had a red blotch on my operated breast had a diagnostic mammogram and ultra-sound, all was clear, found nothing. I'm having 3D mammogram next week..Almost 4 years cancer free..Still it's good to be our own advocates...Good luck. Report
Posts.Title: Latest update

Posts.Content: I would go back and see your OB/GYN.... Report
Posts.Title: Latest update

Posts.Content: Wait for the mammogram results it could and probably is a fatty cyst. Best wishes! Report
